entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 10 except minus 5 along the coast.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low minus 10 except minus 5 along the coast. Wind chill minus 18 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 05 March 2023
